api_list.name: getOrderById
get all data from api
api_list.description: read all data from api to show on detail screen
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://androidapi1.p.rapidapi.com/store/getAll"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "androidapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
